name: GOLF KEEPER (itch)
description:
Casual golf, where with one hit you need to score a ball in the hole.
You can control the ball trajectory by adding various elements to the field.
You need to consider everything to the smallest detail: the degree of rotation, the rebound where the ball will fly.

This game was created by 2 developers.

1 programmer and 1 game designer and fashion designer.

As a basis for development, we took our sources from another project. In order to make the necessary mechanics in a short time

https://twitter.com/golf_keeper
